short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow to remove already seen videos from the youtube search results. Threshold can be adjusted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of being recommanded YouTube videos you saw already ? Tired of searching for videos and seing the same ones over and over again ? Well, YT Hide Seen Videos could help you with that.

YT Hide Seen Videos allows you to hide videos you already saw based on the video progress bar. This way, your data stay in your computer and is not needed to be sent in any kind of server.
It also allow to integrate a thresold : 
Let's say you don't want to watch videos that you stopped halfway through. Then set the thresold at 50% and enjoy your new, unpolluted, content.

Simply install the extension, set the thresold at the desired value (or use the default 90%) and hit the "hide" button. That's it, you can now browse YouTube and enjoy your experience.
